student & developer

// about me

hi, i'm whop42!

i'm a student interested in computers (more specifically programming, cybersecurity, linux, and open source)

most of my time is taken up by schoolwork (especially september-june), but I try to find some time for projects here and there

// skills

  • * python/golang scripting
  • * linux administration
  • * basic CTF/ethical hacking, learning more
  • * html/css/js (+ react/preact/tailwind)
  • * fullstack deno w/ ts
  • * competitive programming with Java
  • * minecraft mods with fabricMC/quilt
  • * fluent english, broken spanish

// projects

  • LinuxConvert ↴

    2022-present | 2nd place in category at WSSEF

    a program for migrating settings/applications from Windows to Linux with minimal user interaction

  • dent client ↴

    2020, 2022 | proof-of-concept minecraft tool

    unique method of injecting cheats into Minecraft using a client-database system within the client

  • shoeprint-analysis ↴

    2022-2023 | best in class forensics project

    first application to determine the flex of a shoeprint based on scanned 3D models with a novel method of analysis (group project, I wrote the code)
